ResourceHeader.Description: The VLF/ELF crossed loop antenna was settled at this observatory by Prof. Shiokawa of ISEE. Collaborators of this organiozation: Institute of Cosmophysical Research and Aeronomy.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please contact the principal investigator (PI) of the ISEE VLF/ELF observation, Prof. K. Shiokawa (shiokawa at isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp) before using the data. This VLF/ELF site is cooperatd with Institute of Cosmophysical Research and Aeronomy.

InformationURL.Name: ISEE VLF/ELF Data
InformationURL.Description: The history of the configuration and quick-look data are available. All the plotted data and images are just for browsing purpose and are not fully calibrated. Please do not use the data at any presentations and publications without contacting the PI.
